languages.text: "Что ж, вас он точно выслушает, а не..." {n}Мужчина скалится, ощупывая сломанные ребра.{/n} "...вы понимаете".

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] {n}Услышав это имя Бригадир на мгновение ёжится. Его рука невольно тянется к сломанным рёбрам.{/n} "Что ж, пожалуй, этого нельзя было избежать. Буду надеяться, что ваше участие в этом наконец принесёт нам долгожданный покой (мб покой неподходящее слово для ситуации?)."

languages.text: "Well, in your case, he'll certainly hear you out and not..." {n}He grins and indicates his broken ribs.{/n} "You know."
languages.original_text: "Что ж, вас он точно выслушает, а не..." {n}Мужчина скалится, ощупывая сломанные ребра.{/n} "...вы понимаете".

traits.locale_text: "Well, if it's you, he'll certainly hear you out and not—" {n}The man grins and feels at his broken ribs.{/n} "—you know."
"Well, if it's you, he'll certainly hear you out and not—" {n}The man grins and feels at his broken ribs.{/n} "—you know."
"Well, in your case, he'll certainly hear you out and not..." {n}The man grins and indicates his broken ribs.{/n} "You know."
"Well, in your case, he'll certainly hear you out and not..." {n}The man grins and indicates his broken ribs.{/n} "You know."
"Well, in your case, he'll certainly hear you out and not..." {n}He grins and indicates his broken ribs.{/n} "You know."
"Well, in your case, he'll certainly hear you out and not..." {n}He grins and indicates his broken ribs.{/n} "You know."

languages.text: «Bueno, en su caso, estoy seguro de que le escuchará en vez de...». {n}Sonríe y señala sus costillas rotas.{/n} «Ya me entiende».
languages.original_text: "Well, in your case, he'll certainly hear you out and not..." {n}He grins and indicates his broken ribs.{/n} "You know."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, en su caso, estoy seguro de que le escuchará en vez de...». {n}Sonríe y señala sus costillas rotas.{/n} «Ya me entiende».

languages.text: 「まあ、陛下の場合、奴は確実に話を聞くだろうし、しないはずだ…」{n}彼はニヤリと笑い、折れた肋骨を見せる。{/n}「こういうことをな」
languages.original_text: "Well, in your case, he'll certainly hear you out and not..." {n}He grins and indicates his broken ribs.{/n} "You know."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、陛下の場合、奴は確実に話を聞くだろうし、しないはずだ…」{n}彼はニヤリと笑い、折れた肋骨を見せる。{/n}「こういうことをな」

languages.text: “好吧，既然是您去谈，他肯定会好好听您把话说完，不会……”{n}他咧着嘴笑了起来，指着自己被打断的肋骨。{/n}“您懂的。”
languages.original_text: "Well, in your case, he'll certainly hear you out and not..." {n}He grins and indicates his broken ribs.{/n} "You know."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，既然是您去谈，他肯定会好好听您把话说完，不会……”{n}他咧着嘴笑了起来，指着自己被打断的肋骨。{/n}“您懂的。”

languages.text: "Nun, in Eurem Fall hört er bestimmt zu und wird nicht ..." {n}Er grinst und zeigt auf seine gebrochenen Rippen.{/n} "Ihr wisst schon."
languages.original_text: "Well, in your case, he'll certainly hear you out and not..." {n}He grins and indicates his broken ribs.{/n} "You know."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, in Eurem Fall hört er bestimmt zu und wird nicht ..." {n}Er grinst und zeigt auf seine gebrochenen Rippen.{/n} "Ihr wisst schon."

languages.text: « Si c'est vous, je suis sûr qu'il vous écoutera plutôt que de... » {n}Il désigne ses côtes cassées avec un rictus.{/n} « Vous savez. »
languages.original_text: "Well, in your case, he'll certainly hear you out and not..." {n}He grins and indicates his broken ribs.{/n} "You know."

traits.locale_text: « Si c'est vous, je suis sûr qu'il vous écoutera plutôt que de... » {n}Il désigne ses côtes cassées avec un rictus.{/n} « Vous savez. »

languages.text: "Dâhil olursanız sizi muhakkak ki dinleyecektir ve o yaptıklarını..." {n}Sırıtarak kırık kaburgalarını işaret ediyor.{/n} "Biliyorsunuz işte."
languages.original_text: "Well, in your case, he'll certainly hear you out and not..." {n}He grins and indicates his broken ribs.{/n} "You know."
